shipping_options.name: I want to return it myself

products.title: Andromischus cristatus
products.description: Andromischus cristatus is a unique succulent with densely hairy, crinkled leaves that give it an intriguing texture. Known for its attractive, rosette-shaped growth, this plant is easy to care for and adds a touch of charm to any indoor space. Its minimal water requirements make it perfect for beginners, and it thrives in bright, diffused light. A great choice for a low-maintenance, decorative addition to your collection.

products.title: Andromischus maculatus
products.description: Andromischus maculatus has fleshy, spotted leaves and a compact growth habit. Easy to grow and thrives in full sun.

products.title: Andromischus cooperi
products.description: Andromischus cooperi features thick leaves with red spots. Grows well in slightly shaded areas.

products.title: Andromischus marianiae 'Little Spheroid'
products.description: Andromischus marianiae 'Little Spheroid' is a rare succulent with dense, knobby green leaves that form a compact mound. Thrives in bright, diffused light and requires minimal watering.

products.title: Aloe vera
products.description: Aloe vera is a well-known succulent valued for its soothing gel and minimal care needs. Thrives in bright, direct light and tolerates drought.

products.title: Aloe juvenna
products.description: Aloe juvenna, also known as Tiger Tooth Aloe, features spiky green leaves with white spots. Perfect for sunny indoor spots or outdoor containers.

products.title: Aloe aristata
products.description: Aloe aristata has dense rosettes of dark green, toothed leaves with white markings. This hardy aloe prefers bright, indirect light.

products.title: Aloe humilis
products.description: Aloe humilis is a dwarf aloe species with short, spiky blue-green leaves covered in white bumps. It enjoys full sun and little water.

products.title: Ceropegia woodii
products.subtitle: String of Hearts
products.description: Ceropegia woodii, commonly known as String of Hearts, features long trailing vines with heart-shaped leaves. Ideal for hanging baskets and bright indoor spaces.

products.title: Ceropegia sandersonii
products.subtitle: Parachute Plant
products.description: Ceropegia sandersonii is a vining succulent known for its parachute-like green flowers. It thrives in bright, indirect light and moderate warmth.

products.title: Ceropegia ampliata
products.description: Ceropegia ampliata is a climbing succulent with unusual tubular flowers and smooth, fleshy stems. Prefers filtered sunlight and well-draining soil.

products.title: Ceropegia 'Silver Glory'
products.subtitle: Silver String of Hearts
products.description: This cultivar of Ceropegia woodii features silvery heart-shaped leaves with deep green edges. Excellent for hanging displays with cascading vines.

products.title: Dracaena marginata
products.subtitle: Dragon Tree
products.description: Dracaena marginata, known as the Dragon Tree, features slender green leaves with red edges. A hardy, upright plant ideal for bright indoor corners.

products.title: Dracaena fragrans
products.subtitle: Corn Plant
products.description: Dracaena fragrans, also called Corn Plant, has wide, arching leaves with a glossy green color. Perfect for shaded interiors with low maintenance needs.

products.title: Dischidia nummularia
products.subtitle: String of Nickels
products.description: Dischidia nummularia is a trailing epiphyte with small, coin-shaped leaves. Ideal for hanging pots and bright, indirect light.

products.title: Dischidia ovata
products.subtitle: Watermelon Dischidia
products.description: Dischidia ovata stands out with its striped, watermelon-like leaves. A beautiful vining plant for shelves and hanging planters.

products.title: Dischidia ruscifolia
products.subtitle: Million Hearts
products.description: Dischidia ruscifolia, or Million Hearts, is a charming vining plant with pairs of tiny, heart-shaped leaves. Great for decorative hanging displays.

products.title: Sansevieria trifasciata 'Laurentii'
products.subtitle: Variegated Snake Plant
products.description: Sansevieria 'Laurentii' features sword-like, upright leaves edged in golden yellow. Known for its air-purifying qualities and tolerance to low light.

products.title: Sansevieria cylindrica
products.subtitle: African Spear Plant
products.description: Sansevieria cylindrica displays cylindrical, pointed leaves arranged in an upright fan. An architectural plant that thrives on neglect.

products.title: Crassula ovata
products.subtitle: Jade Plant
products.description: Crassula ovata, commonly known as the Jade Plant, is a classic succulent with thick, glossy green leaves. It thrives in bright locations and is valued for its longevity and low maintenance.

products.title: Haworthia fasciata
products.subtitle: Zebra Plant
products.description: Haworthia fasciata, known as the Zebra Plant, is a compact succulent with dark green leaves and white horizontal stripes. Ideal for desks and shelves due to its small size and minimal care needs.

products.title: Mammillaria elongata
products.subtitle: Ladyfinger Cactus
products.description: Mammillaria elongata forms clustered cylindrical stems covered in golden spines. A low-maintenance cactus that adds texture and interest to small pots.

products.title: Echinopsis subdenudata
products.subtitle: Domino Cactus
products.description: Echinopsis subdenudata, or the Domino Cactus, is a globe-shaped cactus with white areoles and occasional night-blooming flowers. It thrives on minimal water and bright light.

products.title: Kalanchoe tomentosa
products.subtitle: Panda Plant
products.description: Kalanchoe tomentosa, also known as Panda Plant, is a charming succulent with fuzzy, silver-green leaves edged in brown. It’s perfect for bright indoor spaces and requires minimal care.

products.title: Nolina recurvata
products.subtitle: Ponytail Palm
products.description: Nolina recurvata, also known as the Ponytail Palm, features a bulbous trunk and cascading, strap-like leaves. This low-maintenance plant thrives in bright light and dry conditions.

products.title: Nolina longifolia
products.description: Nolina longifolia is an ornamental succulent with a thickened stem and long, arching leaves. It’s an excellent choice for bright interiors and requires minimal watering.

products.title: Opuntia microdasys
products.subtitle: Bunny Ears Cactus
products.description: Opuntia microdasys, also known as Bunny Ears Cactus, features flat, oval pads covered with golden glochids. It thrives in bright sunlight and requires very little water, making it ideal for sunny indoor spots.

products.title: Peperomia obtusifolia
products.subtitle: Baby Rubber Plant
products.description: Peperomia obtusifolia is a compact houseplant with thick, glossy leaves. It thrives in indirect light and requires little maintenance, making it perfect for desks and shelves.

products.title: Peperomia caperata
products.subtitle: Emerald Ripple
products.description: Peperomia caperata features deeply ridged leaves with a rich, dark green color. It is a low-growing plant perfect for shaded interiors and thrives with minimal watering.

products.title: Peperomia argyreia
products.subtitle: Watermelon Peperomia
products.description: Peperomia argyreia, nicknamed Watermelon Peperomia, has striking foliage that resembles the rind of a watermelon. It’s a favorite among plant lovers for its unique look and ease of care.

products.title: Sedum morganianum
products.subtitle: Burro's Tail
products.description: Sedum morganianum, commonly known as Burro's Tail, is a trailing succulent with thick, blue-green leaves that cascade beautifully over the edges of pots. It's ideal for hanging planters in bright but indirect light.

products.title: Rhipsalis cassutha
products.subtitle: Mistletoe Cactus
products.description: Rhipsalis cassutha, or Mistletoe Cactus, is a unique epiphytic cactus with long, thin, green stems that droop and create a cascading effect. It thrives in bright, indirect light and is a great choice for hanging baskets.

products.title: Rhipsalis baccifera
products.subtitle: White Mistletoe Cactus
products.description: Rhipsalis baccifera, also known as White Mistletoe Cactus, is a unique cactus that thrives in low light conditions and requires little care. Its small, round white berries give it an attractive, delicate appearance.

products.title: Sansevieria trifasciata
products.subtitle: Snake Plant
products.description: Sansevieria trifasciata, or Snake Plant, is a popular low-maintenance houseplant known for its upright, sword-like leaves with dark green and light green banding. It thrives in low light and is perfect for beginners.

products.title: Euphorbia tirucalli
products.subtitle: Pencil Cactus
products.description: Euphorbia tirucalli, commonly known as Pencil Cactus, is a striking succulent with thin, pencil-like branches that turn from green to red-orange when exposed to bright sunlight. It's a low-maintenance plant ideal for sunny spots.

products.title: Lithops lesliei
products.subtitle: Living Stones
products.description: Lithops lesliei, also known as Living Stones, is a small succulent that mimics the appearance of pebbles or stones, making it a perfect plant for rock gardens or decorative containers. It thrives in bright, indirect light and is well-suited to dry conditions.
